sentences.sContent: I just decided I was a bit too frivolous to be a doctor.
sentences.sCn: 我只是认定自己有点儿太轻率，不适合当医生。

remMethod.val: friv(愚蠢) + olous → 愚蠢的 → 轻佻的

trans.tranOther: If you describe someone as frivolous, you mean they behave in a silly or light-hearted way, rather than being serious and sensible
